name.zh: 儿童学生双肩书包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact school backpack designed for kids and everyday carry. Features a roomy main compartment, side bottle pocket, and padded shoulder straps for comfort. OEM/ODM customization available for colors, fabrics (including recycled options), logo patch, lining, pocket layout, and packaging.
description.zh: 面向儿童/学生日常使用的轻便双肩书包。主仓容量充足，侧边水杯袋设计，肩带与背部可做加厚更舒适。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：颜色配色、面料（可选再生环保材料）、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Padding: Foam/EVA padding for straps & back panel (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背负：肩带/背部可加海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）

en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + internal sleeve (optional) + side bottle pocket
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 内部夹层（可选）+ 侧边水杯袋
zh.舒适背负: 肩带/背部可加厚衬垫（可定制）
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
